app_detail:
Welcome to Word Search Quest, the most addicting word puzzle game tailored for everyone on mobile and tablet! Hunt words now! ğŸ”

Play the Quest and go through thousands of levels with increasing difficulty. Unlock rewards and discover new words

Choose and play non stop themes you love such as Animals, Countries, Actors or Delicious Foods! Choose you difficulty and have fun

In the RELAX mode, you find hidden words at your own pace and with your own difficulty setting 

â­ Easy to play with a fresh and modern look
â­ Have fun in the Quest road and play smarter and smarter puzzles
â­ Play without connection, whenever and wherever you want
â­ No timer, no pressure
â­ Special rewards: the more words you found, the more coins
â­ Unlock 23 themes, with more to come
â­ Relax mode with an infinite numbers of grids with difficulties for everyone
â­ 10 Languages with more than 3000 words per language 

Word Search Quest is completely FREE to play, enjoy now an unlimited number of word puzzles and hours of brain teasers!
